skills.skill: Cloud Data Warehousing (BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift, Databricks)

duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide support on technical inquiries to CARTO customers in the Americas through support channels.
Analyze, triage, and discuss with product management, engineering, and design team members to provide clarity to customers regarding their inquiries.
Develop technical examples for customers and provide first-hand technical support.
Be available for on-call requests for agreed shifts.
Become an expert in a cloud native mapping platform and Spatial Analysis using SQL in modern warehouses like BigQuery, Snowflake, Redshift, and Databricks.
Participate with leading open source projects such as deck.gl and be part of the data visualization community.

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in Computer Science, or related fields.
